snippet.title: StarVaders - Future Games Show Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist StarVaders on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2097570/StarVaders/
Join the Discord: https://discord.com/invite/bEETNGyGVE

Coming in 2025!

Defend the Earth from alien invaders in the ULTIMATE fusion of deckbuilding and grid-based tactics. Pilot a mech, discover game-breaking combos, and protect the future of humanity in this endlessly re-playable roguelike.
